name: 古明地五: 与觉大人下情侣棋 ~ Satori Five!
name_original: 古明地五: 与觉大人下情侣棋 ~ Satori Five!
description:
In some East Asian countries, FIR is called "lovers' chess", which is usually a game played by lovers.
《Satori Five!》 is a competitive game with Western-style chess, Chinese chess and Japanese chess.
Players will start a tense and exciting FIR (Gobang) duel with the mind reading monster in Touhou Project, Komeiji Satori.
In addition, you can talk about your life with Satori.

【Extra】


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1551320/

【Story】


While maintaining the nuclear facilities of the ruins of scorching hell, Kappas brought some "the Great Generals" for entertainment.
"the Great Generals" was originally a popular game between Tengus and Kappas. It is said that it is very boring.
However, these pieces were found in Tombs, including some pieces of "machine gun" and "artillery" which are completely unknown. There is no explanation, that is to say, it can't be used to play.
But, for Komeiji Satori, who is good at compiling stories, it is not a problem at all. Satori bought these pieces from the Kappas, and then wrote a set of rules by himself, which he called "Five Generals".
Because pets are generally not very smart, she plays chess with herself all day at home, which is very boring. If a visitor is willing to play a fierce chess game with her, she will be very happy~
"Five Generals" is a game that pays equal attention to strategy and luck. Even if you play with monsters who can read your mind, those who are lucky and those who have no idea can win.

【Rule】


Easy / Normal / Hard all contain basic FIR (Gobang) rule.

Hard mode increases the ability of arms on the basic rule:
before the chess pieces are placed, it will show which targets will be destroyed.
「Infantry」Pincer attack enemies.
「Cavalry」Pincer attack enemies; When the enemy is successfully eliminated, move to the position of the nearest enemy.
「Tank」Pincer attack enemies; With armour, which can counteract an attack.
「Machine Gun」Attack the enemies and friendly forces in the line with the most enemy and the least friendly forces in the 8 squares around this chess; When there are new friendly 「Infantry」 in 8 spaces around it, if there is an enemy in 1 space of the opposite extension line, attack the enemy.
「Howitzer」Pincer attack enemies; When there are new friendly 「Infantry」 in 8 spaces around it, if there is an enemy in 2 and 3 space of the opposite extension line, attack the enemy.
「Artillery」The attack area is a cross shaped area. The center of the cross shaped area is four squares up, down, left and right of the distance 2. The one with the most enemy troops and the least friendly troops around will be destroyed and the armour will be ignored.
「Fortress」 With 2 armours, which can counteract two attacks. When there are new friendly forces in 8 spaces around it, give them 1 armours, and stack the armours to 2 layers at most.
「Lieutenant General」He has all the abilities of 「infantry」; With armour, which can counteract an attack; He can organize a charge. If there are new enemies around he, he will attack the enemy. If the enemy is destroyed, he will move to the enemy's position.
「Naval Bomber」Directly eliminate all the chesses that are self centered and within the distance of 2 (Manhattan Distance, big cross shaped area), and then withdraw from the battlefield.
